Reviews.Title: “A pretty nice hotel to stay in Venice”
Reviews.Author: Subhashis N Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: location hotel wonderful st marco boat stop minutes walk hotel budget hotel price location difficulty finding hotel reception coming unlike european cities people venice understand english nice tidy service desk polite immensely helpful service desk plus hotel hotel access internet connection concern breakfast ok looking proper hotel stay venice close attraction definately look

Reviews.Title: “good experience at Al Tiepolo”
Reviews.Author: windsurfer_2003
Reviews.Content: stayed november visiting biennale location able walk staff friendly professional tastefully modern quiet clean bathroom pretty enjoyed breakfast morning looking canal meat bread cheese fruit cereal yogurt especially liked bowl plain yogurt al tiepolo mind visit venice
